original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2481)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2481)@</color> 對指定的地點施放迷魂煙霧，讓範圍內的士兵自相殘殺。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2481)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2481)@</color> Cast Ecstasy Smoke to the designated location, letting soldiers in the range kill each other.
